docs.lead_paragraph: In a study of treatments for skin infections, the choice between clindamycin and cephalexin made no difference.

headline.seo: Wound Care May Matter More Than Type of Antibiotics
headline.main: Safety: Wound Care May Matter More Than Antibiotics
headline.print_headline: SAFETY: Wound Care May Matter More Than Drugs

docs.snippet: In a study of treatments for skin infections, the choice between clindamycin and cephalexin made no difference.
